Hey, Robert here!

I'm an electrical engineer and computer scientist from the Bay Area building for the future of AI-driven hardware and software optimizations. On the side, I create videos about tech and productivity and projects for learning.

Projects

Check it Out

Optimized Triton GEMM Kernel for Transformer Inference on Non-NVIDIA GPUs

GEMM kernel for efficient self-attention and feedforward mechanisms in LLMs. Targeting improvements in throughput, latency, and memory efficiency compared to cIBLAS.

Check it Out

Darwin

A multimodal AI learning assistant that enhances online lecture learning and retention with personalized review and highlights.

Check it Out

ROV Autonomous CV System

Dual-camera stereovision system for accurate depth estimation and 3D mapping, YOLOv5 integration for object detection and tracking.

Check it Out

HUGS: Haptic Under-Garment Support

A Flexinol-contracting vest with custom PCB and smart app to deliver immediate DTP for anxiety/autism patients.

Check it Out

Using an Ensemble of GANs and CNNs to More Accurately Generate and Diagnose Skin Condition Datasets in Diverse Skin Types

Generated and validated synthetic images to address ethical AI bias due to lack of diverse skin condition images.
